title: Spalding NBA 60" Glass Arena View H Series In-Ground Hoop System

description.detailed:
• Spalding NBA 60" Glass Arena View H Series In-Ground Adjustable Basketball Hoop System
  • Backboard size: 60" x 38"
  • Tempered glass board; 3' offset
  • Steel board frame with aluminum trim
  • Positive Lock breakaway rim
  • 7' to 10' height adjustment; U-Turn Pro lift; Detachable handle
  • 6" square steel pole with heavy-duty padding
  • Adjustable Basketball Hoop system designed for outdoor residential play
description.short:
• Board size: 60" x 38"
  • Tempered glass board; 3' offset
  • Adjustable Basketball Hoop system, adjusts from 7' to 10' feet in height; U-Turn Pro lift; Detachable handle
description.medium: The Spalding 86604HGP Arena View 60" Glass In-Ground Basketball System can be installed in your backyard or on your driveway for hours of basketball fun. This system will have young and old alike living a more active lifestyle. This unique Spalding basketball system has a 60" glass backboard that is reinforced with a solid steel H-frame for added strength. This makes it appropriate for even very tall adults. The height of the rim is easily adjustable with the U-turn height adjustment crank, allowing you to customize the basketball backboard system for young or old players. You can adjust the height anywhere from 7' to 10'. This height-adjustment basketball device comes with a 6" square pole and a pole pad that helps to protect players for added safety. Have fun for years to come and get your daily exercise with this basketball backboard system.
